text:
LVe TOBACCO COMPANY

MEMORANDUM

January 10, 2000

To: TR. Staab

JA. Wilson

 

 

Attached is a statement from Jones Day Reavis & Pogue for their
work in the month of November on arbitration matters. Lorillard’s share
of this statement, based on market share, is $13,714.87. Please arrange
to have a check issued to Jones Day in that amount and forward it

directly to them at their Chicago office.

JAW:jp
Attachments
ce: RS, Milstein

H. Evans
(w/attachments)

099SbS¢8
